full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KLU'I DBANG PHYUG RGYAL PO'I SGRUBS THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CING GIR GNAM GYI RIGS LAS AU TZI ME CHI TSE BRTAN DON GRUB SE CHEN CHING DBANG GI DPON MO RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING DANG STOBS MKHYEN DPYOD YANGS PA BSOD NAMS DPAL 'JOM GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE TSUL DPAL BZANG NGO, DGE'O, ,)
